author: chetanm
msg: OAK-366 - MongoDB microkernal integration with OSGi
* Upgrading the mongo-java-driver version to 2.9.1 as it has required OSGi metadata compared to 2.7.3 version
* Changing version of commons-coded to 1.5 as the required api is present in previous version. With this we avoid updating the commons-codec version in various quickstarts
* Sling PropertiesUtil class is inlined to avoid dependency on Sling jars
* DBCollection class is removed as the newer version does not have final modifier which was preventing us from creating Mocks for testing
* In addition required package-info files are added to exported packages

author: giger
msg: SANTUARIO-346 - Performance update. Memory consumption for signature case is now much lower. This improves
the overall "time" performance a little bit too.
